thread.title: Dance to Rob Gronkowski’s party playlist this weekend - Patriots
thread.title_full: Dance to Rob Gronkowski’s party playlist this weekend - Patriots

author: boston.com
title: Dance to Rob Gronkowski’s party playlist this weekend - Patriots
text:
Want to party with Rob Gronkowski?
Well, good luck making that happen.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Want to party like Rob Gronkowski?
Dante Deiana, a DJ you may know simply as Dante , can help with that.
Gronkowski’s personal DJ, Dante is scheduled to appear on Gronk’s Party Ship in February. The Worcester native shared a few of the Patriots tight end’s favorite party songs with Boston.com to ensure your crew can rock out to the Gronkowski family’s playlist this weekend.
Please dance responsibly.
Rob’s Party Playlist
“Shake It Off,” Taylor Swift
“Young, Wild and Free,” Snoop Dogg and Wiz Khalifa, featuring Bruno Mars
“Pursuit of Happiness,” (Steve Aoki Remix), Kid Cudi
“Bugatti,” Ace Hood, featuring Future & Rick Ross
Rob isn’t the only member of the Gronkowski family with preferred tunes. Dante also shared the favorite party tracks of Rob’s father and his four brothers:
Gordie Sr.’s Party Playlist
“Sexy and I Know It,” LMFAO
Dan’s Party Playlist
“Opposite of Adults,” Chiddy Bang
“The Impression That I Get,” Mighty Mighty Bosstones
“I Cry,” Flo Rida
“Hey Brother,” Avicci
“Chicken Fried,” Zac Brown Band
Gordie Jr.’s Party Playlist
“Sorry for Party Rocking,” LMFAO
“Turbulence,” Steve Aoki
“The Night,” 3Lau
“We Own It,” 2 Chainz & Wiz Khalfia
“Teach Me How to Dougie,” California Swag District
Chris’s Party Playlist
“No Type,” Rae Sremmund
“Zipper,” Jason Derulo
“Lifestyle,” Rich Gang featuring Young Thug
“No Mediocre,” T.I.
“IDFWU,” Big Sean & E-40
“Post To Be,” Omarion featuring Chris Brown
“Loyal,” Chris Brown featuring Lil Wayne
“Kama Sutra,” Jason Derulo featuring Kid Ink
“Time of Our Lives,” Pitbull featuring Ne Yo
Glenn’s Party Playlist
“Spaceman,” Carnage
“Trap Queen,” Fetty Wap
“Victory 2004,” Puff Daddy featuring 50 Cent & Notorious BIG
“Bubble Butt,” Major Lazer
“Danza Kaduro,” Don Omar
“Mercy, Kanye West
